languages.text: Стремясь оторваться от преследования очередного корабля мон-кай, эльдары перегружают системы судна, и один из подбитых двигателей не выдерживает перегрузки. На глазах сотен офицеров судно ксеносов вспыхивает за витражами синеватым огнем — а затем разлетается по системе тысячей мелких осколков.

Trying to outpace the pursuit of the next mon-keigh vessel, the Aeldari overload their voidship's drives. One of the damaged engines is unable to bear the strain. Before the eyes of a hundred officers, the xenoship flashes a fiery light blue through the stained-glass windows as thousands of tiny shards disperse across the system
languages.original_text: Стремясь оторваться от преследования очередного корабля мон-кай, эльдары перегружают системы судна, и один из подбитых двигателей не выдерживает перегрузки. На глазах сотен офицеров судно ксеносов вспыхивает за витражами синеватым огнем — а затем разлетается по системе тысячей мелких осколков.

traits.locale_text: Trying to outpace the pursuit of the next mon-keigh vessel, the Aeldari overload their voidship's drives, and one of the damaged engines is unable to bear the strain. Before the eyes of a hundred officers, the xenoship flashes in light blue fire through the stained-glass windows, and spreads across the system in a thousand tiny shards.

Trying to outpace the pursuit of the next mon-keigh vessel, the Aeldari overload their voidship's drives, and one of the damaged engines is unable to bear the strain. Before the eyes of a hundred officers, the xenoship flashes in light blue fire through the stained-glass windows, and spreads across the system in a thousand tiny shards.

Trying to outpace the pursuit of the next mon-keigh vessel, the Aeldari overload their voidship's drives. One of the damaged engines is unable to bear the strain. Before the eyes of a hundred officers, the xenoship flashes a fiery light blue through the stained-glass windows as thousands of tiny shards disperse across the system

Trying to outpace the pursuit of the next mon-keigh vessel, the Aeldari overload their voidship's drives. One of the damaged engines is unable to bear the strain. Before the eyes of a hundred officers, the xenoship flashes a fiery light blue through the stained-glass windows as thousands of tiny shards disperse across the system

Trying to outpace the pursuit of the next mon-keigh vessel, the Aeldari overload their voidship's drives. One of the damaged engines is unable to bear the strain. Before the eyes of a hundred officers, the xenoship flashes a fiery light blue through the stained-glass windows as thousands of tiny shards disperse across the system

languages.text: 为了摆脱这艘追击他们的猴子飞船，艾达灵族超载启动了虚空舰的驱动器。其中一台损坏的发动机中无法承受这种拉力。到了最后，那艘异形飞船散发出蓝色的火光，化作了成千上万的微小碎片，散落在整个星系中。这一幕透过虚空舰的彩色玻璃窗，被数百名军官亲眼见证。
languages.original_text: Trying to outpace the pursuit of the next mon-keigh vessel, the Aeldari overload their voidship's drives. One of the damaged engines is unable to bear the strain. Before the eyes of a hundred officers, the xenoship flashes a fiery light blue through the stained-glass windows as thousands of tiny shards disperse across the system

traits.locale_text: 为了摆脱这艘追击他们得的猴子飞船，艾达灵族超载启动了虚空舰的驱动器。其中一台损坏的发动机中无法承受这种拉力。到了最后，那艘异形飞船散发出蓝色的火光，化作了成千上万的微小碎片，散落在整个星系中。这一幕透过虚空舰的彩色玻璃窗，被数百名军官亲眼见证。

languages.text: 次に現れたモン＝ケイの船の追跡を振り切ろうとしたアエルダリは、ヴォイドシップの駆動力に負担をかけすぎてしまい、損傷したエンジンのひとつが負担に耐えられなくなった。100人の士官の目の前で、ステンドグラスの窓の向こうに見える異種族船が燃えるような水色の閃光を放ち、何千もの小さな破片が星系全体に散らばっていく。
languages.original_text: Trying to outpace the pursuit of the next mon-keigh vessel, the Aeldari overload their voidship's drives. One of the damaged engines is unable to bear the strain. Before the eyes of a hundred officers, the xenoship flashes a fiery light blue through the stained-glass windows as thousands of tiny shards disperse across the system

traits.locale_text: 次に現れたモン＝ケイの船の追跡を振り切ろうとしたアエルダリは、ヴォイドシップの駆動力に負担をかけすぎてしまい、損傷したエンジンのひとつが負担に耐えられなくなった。100人の士官の目の前で、ステンドグラスの窓の向こうに見える異種族船が燃えるような水色の閃光を放ち、何千もの小さな破片が星系全体に散らばっていく。

languages.text: Intentando adelantarse a la próxima nave mon-keigh, los Aeldari sobrecargan los motores de su nave del vacío. Uno de los motores dañados es incapaz de soportar el esfuerzo. Ante los ojos de un centenar de oficiales, la nave xenos emite un destello azul claro a través de las vidrieras mientras miles de pequeños fragmentos se dispersan por el sistema.
languages.original_text: Trying to outpace the pursuit of the next mon-keigh vessel, the Aeldari overload their voidship's drives. One of the damaged engines is unable to bear the strain. Before the eyes of a hundred officers, the xenoship flashes a fiery light blue through the stained-glass windows as thousands of tiny shards disperse across the system

traits.locale_text: Intentando adelantarse a la próxima nave mon-keigh, los Aeldari sobrecargan los motores de su nave del vacío. Uno de los motores dañados es incapaz de soportar el esfuerzo. Ante los ojos de un centenar de oficiales, la nave xenos emite un destello azul claro a través de las vidrieras mientras miles de pequeños fragmentos se dispersan por el sistema.

languages.text: Um dem nächsten Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiff zu entkommen, das sie verfolgt, überlasten die Aeldari den Antrieb ihres Raumschiffs. Eines der beschädigten Triebwerke hält der Belastung nicht stand. Vor den Augen von einhundert Offizieren blitzt das Xenoschiff vor den Buntglasfenstern feurig blau auf und Tausende von winzigen Splittern verteilen sich im System.
languages.original_text: Trying to outpace the pursuit of the next mon-keigh vessel, the Aeldari overload their voidship's drives. One of the damaged engines is unable to bear the strain. Before the eyes of a hundred officers, the xenoship flashes a fiery light blue through the stained-glass windows as thousands of tiny shards disperse across the system

traits.locale_text: Um dem nächsten Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiff zu entkommen, das sie verfolgt, überlasten die Aeldari den Antrieb ihres Raumschiffs. Eines der beschädigten Triebwerke hält der Belastung nicht stand. Vor den Augen von einhundert Offizieren blitzt das Xenoschiff vor den Buntglasfenstern feurig blau auf und Tausende von winzigen Splittern verteilen sich im System.

languages.text: Dans une tentative désespérée pour semer le vaisseau mon-keigh, les Aeldaris provoquent une surchauffe de leurs moteurs et l'un des modules endommagés cède sous la pression. Sous les yeux d'une centaine d'officiers rassemblés derrière les baies vitrées de la passerelle, le bâtiment xénos est pulvérisé dans un fulgurant éclair bleu et des milliers de petits éclats se dispersent à travers le système.
languages.original_text: Trying to outpace the pursuit of the next mon-keigh vessel, the Aeldari overload their voidship's drives. One of the damaged engines is unable to bear the strain. Before the eyes of a hundred officers, the xenoship flashes a fiery light blue through the stained-glass windows as thousands of tiny shards disperse across the system

traits.locale_text: Dans une tentative désespérée pour semer le vaisseau mon-keigh, les Aeldaris provoquent une surchauffe de leurs moteurs et l'un des modules endommagés cède sous la pression. Sous les yeux d'une centaine d'officiers rassemblés derrière les baies vitrées de la passerelle, le bâtiment xénos est pulvérisé dans un fulgurant éclair bleu et des milliers de petits éclats se dispersent à travers le système.

languages.text: Hemen ardındaki mon-keigh gemisinden kaçmaya çalışan Aeldariler, uçsuz gemilerinin sürücülerini aşırı yüklüyor. Hasarlı motorlardan biri bu yükü taşıyamıyor. Yüzlerce subayın gözleri önünde zeno gemisi, vitraylara yansıyan alevli, açık mavi bir ışıkla parlıyor. Sonrasında binlerce küçük parça, sistemin dört bir yanına dağılıyor.
languages.original_text: Trying to outpace the pursuit of the next mon-keigh vessel, the Aeldari overload their voidship's drives. One of the damaged engines is unable to bear the strain. Before the eyes of a hundred officers, the xenoship flashes a fiery light blue through the stained-glass windows as thousands of tiny shards disperse across the system
